    • Method Detail

      • createNotificationQueue

        NotificationQueue createNotificationQueue(String svcName,
                                        String queueName,
                                        NotificationQueueService.NotificationQueueHandler handler)
                                          throws NotificationQueueService.NotificationQueueAlreadyExists
        Creates a new NotificationQueue for a given associated with the given service and queueName
        Parameters:
        svcName - the name of the service using that queue
        queueName - a name for that queue (unique per service)
        handler - the handler required for notifying the caller of state change
        Returns:
        a new NotificationQueue
        Throws:
        NotificationQueueService.NotificationQueueAlreadyExists - is the queue associated with that service and name already exits

      • getNotificationQueue

        NotificationQueue getNotificationQueue(String svcName,

                                       throws NotificationQueueService.NoSuchNotificationQueue
        Retrieves an already created NotificationQueue by service and name if it exists
        Parameters:
        svcName -
        queueName -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NotificationQueueService.NoSuchNotificationQueue - if queue does not exist

        queueName -
        Throws:

      • triggerManualQueueProcessing

        the number of processed notifications
